descriptionHTML:
WatchTower watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. WatchTower Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches. Especially for fans of the game "Firewatch"

WatchTower Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Battery level
✔ Day of the month

How to use WatchTower Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the WatchTower watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new watchface like "Firewatch"!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market

If you fan of the game "Firewatch" install app right now!
Please write comments Enjoy your Android Smartwatch!
Thanks!
comments: I cant add the watch face to my watch, yes, it is a android wear device, and ive updated everything to the latest software. Using the Tag Heuer Modular 45
I hate it It does not let you do anything
Crashes Lg urban 1 and it crashes instantly
What is ment to happen Is it a widget or something
Love it. Looks very nice and minimalistic. I have firewatch wallpapers on all of my devices
I don't mind the lack of features it's clean but I don't know what it can do as it doesn't work on my smartwatch. Using Moto 360
